name: Seven Caves in Brown - Handmade leather boots - CUSTOM FIT
description:
A new line of boots inspired by the Aztec heritage.

Accordding to the myth, "the place of the seven caves," at Tamoanchan (the legendary origin of all civilizations) is the place where the ancestors of the Mexica/Aztec came from.

The "Seven Caves" Boots are 100% custom and handmade in a high quality, loustrous brown leather.
They feature a lovely thick fabric with geometrical pattern lining on the inside and can be styled in 2 ways just adjusting their elastic laces!.

These boots match up great withboth leggings and pants..
They are really lightweight and comfy since they feature lightweight flexible Vibram - Cherry soles. 
----------------
The soles are made out of 2 layers.
A layer of 6mm Vibram and also thick leather.

Three layered insoles:
Thick leather, soft cushion, hidden heel cushion, leather insole.
Contact us if you want the boots customized to zero drop.
----------------
*CUSTOM FIT*
Handmade shoes, according to your specific measurements! 
All you have to do is measure your feet the way the guide 
bellow shows and give us these information in addition to your usual size.

"how to measure your feet" guide:
http://driftersleather.blogspot.com/2012/05/get-perfect-fit.html
(copy and paste to a new browser tab)

Sizes:
US 6 - 6,5 - 7,5 - 8,5 - 9 - 9.5
EU 36 - 37 - 38 - 39 - 40 - 41
UK 3.5 - 4 - 5 - 6 - 6.5 - 7

Pick your usual size and also add a note indicating your specific measurements!
For smaller/larger sizes (from 5 US to 13 US women's), please contact us prior your order.

name: Bind in Black Suede - Handmade Leather ballet flat shoes
description:
The "Bind" ballet flat shoes are 100% handmade out of genuine black
high quality suede leather.

This design features a small leather knot in the front, adding an interesting "twist" to the simple ballet flats. Looks gorgeous with a little black dress or a more casual style. 

These ballerinas are really soft, flexible and lightweight. They can be easily folded and stored into a dustbag when you are on the go.

----------------
The soles are made out of thick leather and two combined rubber parts.

Sole with rubber parts.

* anti-slippery
* warmer
* more durable to water

Leather insoles and soft cushion. 
----------------
*CUSTOM FIT*
Handmade shoes, according to your specific measurements! 
All you have to do is measure your feet the way the guide 
bellow shows and give us these information in addition to your usual size.

name: Knot - Suede lace up low top Shoes
description:
The "Knot" lace up low top shoes are 100% handmade out of genuine blue suede and processed high quality leather

This is a classic design based on sneaker type shoes.
It features cotton laces in beige.and it's also really soft and light weight.
The shoes have a wide design that makes them suitable for walking and everyday activities.

This design is really lightweight as we use authentic Vibram soles. 
----------------
Sole features:

* 6 mm thick rubber
* anti-slippery
* really lightweight
* water resistant

Three layered insoles:
soft cushion and leather insole + extra hidden heel cushion.
----------------
Made according to your measurements

Available in
Size:

name: Fringed Frost- Suede Leather Women's Oxford Shoes
description:
The "Fringed Frost" shoes are 100% handmade out of genuine off-white suede and processed high quality leather

This is an edgy design that is decorated with a fringe and a strap with a silver buckle.
It is also really soft and light weight.
The shoes are slip-ons as they feature a hidden elastic part under the decorative strap
They have a wide design that makes them suitable for everyday activities plus boho-casual look.

This design is really lightweight as we use authentic Vibram soles.

name: Brown Tea Party - Handmade Leather & Fabric flat shoes
description:
The "Tea Party" flat shoes are 100% handmade out of genuine tobacco brown
high quality leather and high quality fabric.

They tie with waxed cotton laces. The design is based on the classic oxford style but features a more flexible sole. 
Its body is made of vintage floral fabric and tobacco brown leather.

The Tea party design is a more casual and cuter variant of a classic pair of oxford shoes. 
Looks great with a pair of jeans and a casual T-shirt or even a spring dress.

These shoes are really soft, flexible, lightweight and comfy. They can be easily be packed into your luggage as they weigh less.
----------------
The soles are made out of thick leather and two combined rubber parts.

name: Nude Oxfords - Handmade Leather flat shoes
description:
The "Nude Oxfords" flat shoes are 100% handmade out of genuine blush/nude high quality leather.

They tie with, handmade by us, leather laces. The design is based on the classic oxford style but features a more flexible sole. 
The shoe's body is hand-cut with scissors that make this cute effect.

The Mint Oxfords design is a more casual and cuter variant of a classic pair of oxford shoes. 
Looks great with a pair of pale jeans and a casual T-shirt or even a spring dress.

These shoes are really soft, flexible, lightweight and comfy. They can be easily be packed into your luggage as they weigh less.

name: The Club Oxfords
description: The "The Club" are hand - made out of 100% genuine brown high quality leather. The shoes tie with handmade leather laces. They are decorated with a brown croco processed textured leather that has a gorgeous shine, the classic oxford cap stitching and brown details. This classic design looks gorgeous paired up with tights or shocks and a nice dress or a pair of pants for the smart oxford look. They are really comfortable for a lot of walking and a great alternative to the classic dance shoes. ---------------- The soles are made out of resistant thick leather and two combined rubber parts. Sole with rubber parts. * anti-slippery * warmer * more durable to water Leather insoles, lining and soft cushion. ---------------- Made according to your measurements Available in Size: EU 36 - 37 - 38 - 39 - 40 - 41 US 6 - 6,5 - 7,5 - 8,5 - 9 - 9.5 UK 3.5 - 4 - 5 - 6 -6.5 -7 We also require your measurements in the note to seller. Visit our "how to measure your feet" guide.

name: Artsy Ballet Flats
description: The "Artsy" ballet flat shoes are 100% handmade out of genuine tobacco brown high quality leather. This design features a saturated tobacco brown leather that has a lovely vintage feel and has been heat pressed by hand in order to achieve that unique texture. It also features a tobacco brown matte leather cap toe. These shoes look great with a classic pair of jeans and a shirt or blouse. They are really soft, flexible and lightweight and can be easily folded and stored into a dustbag when you are on the go. ---------------- The soles are made out of thick leather and two combined rubber parts. name: Raven Black Night Ballet Flats
description: Proudly Presenting our new fall - winter collection ! The "Raven Black Night" ballet flat shoes are hand - made out of 100% genuine black high quality leather. This is a really simple and comfortable, yet stylish design, suitable for everyday walks or comfy evenings. Leather insoles . The soles are also made out of thick blue leather and two antislip rubber parts on the front of the sole and heel. They are suitable for outdoor use. They are also really soft and light weight! name: Red Alert Ballet Flats
description: The "Red Alert" ballet flat shoes are hand - made out of 100% genuine red high quality leather. They are decorated with leather stripes attached to their bodies with metalic studs and a handmade leather flower out of the same red leather. Leather insoles . The soles are also made out of thick blue leather and two antislip rubber parts on the front of the sole and heel. They are suitable for outdoor use. They are really comfy for walking. They are also really soft and light weight! The anti - slip sole is an upgrade to our designs which features the following advantages: * anti-slippery * warmer * more durable to water ------- In case you want the soles without the rubber parts, please message us. name: Simply Me in Lilac - Handmade Leather ballet flat shoes
description:
The "Simply me in Lilac" ballet flat shoes are 100% handmade out of genuine pale lilac
high quality leather.

This is a really simple and comfortable, yet stylish design, suitable for everyday walks or comfy evenings available in a variety of colors and textures

These ballerinas are really soft, flexible and lightweight. They can be easily folded and stored into a dustbag when you are on the go.

----------------
The soles are made out of thick leather and two combined rubber parts.

Sole with rubber parts.

* anti-slippery
* warmer
* more durable to water

Leather insoles and soft cushion. 
----------------
*CUSTOM FIT*
Handmade shoes, according to your specific measurements! 
All you have to do is measure your feet the way the guide 
bellow shows and give us these information in addition to your usual size.

"how to measure your feet" guide:
http://driftersleather.blogspot.com/2012/05/get-perfect-fit.html
(copy and paste to a new browser tab)

Sizes:
US 6 - 6,5 - 7,5 - 8,5 - 9 - 9.5
EU 36 - 37 - 38 - 39 - 40 - 41
UK 3.5 - 4 - 5 - 6 - 6.5 - 7

Pick your usual size and also add a note indicating your specific measurements!
For smaller/larger sizes (from 5 US to 13 US women's), please contact us prior your order.

name: Sweet Romance coin purse
description:
A coin purse made out of upcycled pink leather and floral fabric.

Cut by hand, we make our leather purses using high quality zippers, lots of love and make sure it will accompany you for a long, long time.
A pink and golden colored metalic YKK zipper is used.

It can easily fit your keys, coins, usb flash, make up or cards into it.

Size
Width: 13cm
Height: 9cm

name: Shoe care kit with leather case
description:
This shoe care kit by Tarrago includes:

1 cloth for cream application
1 Polish Glove
1 brush for cleaning and polishing
1 jar (50mL) of neutral nutrient cream

Size 13 x 5.2 x 13cm

The cream is soft, carnauba wax-based which nourishes, maintains, shines and enhances the color. 

--------------------

Use instructions:
1.Clean the area before applying. 2. Apply a small amount of cream with a cloth or brush, spreading it evenly. 3. Let dry. 4. Buff for an immediate shine.

name: A Very Colorful World earrings
description:
"If everyone would look for that uniqueness then we would have a very colorful world."



"A Very Colorful World" Leather Earrings (Set of 2)

* These Leather Earrings are handmade out of leather, and %100 FIREPROOF, as all pure
leather products are.

* The earrings are made of 2 layers of leather, all cut in hand.

* You might notice some slight differences between the two earrings as they're totally handmade.That makes each pair unique!

* These cute and colorful hearts are very light and pleasant to wear.


We ship everywhere! Just ask for any additional info!
